p: Withania somnifera, a key plant of Ayurveda, contains compounds inhibiting M pro and S protein, ( Chikhale et al., 2020; Tripathi et al., 2020) and the extract of the plant provides anti-viral immunity by increasing interferon gamma responses and anti-inflammatory activities by decreasing the quantity of interleukin-1, interleukin-6 and Tumor necrosis factor related to COVID-19 ( Niraj and Varsha, 2020).
